#summary Documents the external dependencies ez-vcard depends on

|| *Name* || *Group ID* || *Artifact ID* || *Required?* || *Description* ||
|| [http://commons.apache.org/codec/ Apache Commons Codec] || commons-codec || commons-codec || yes || For base64 and quoted-printable encodings. ||
|| [http://jsoup.org jsoup] || org.jsoup || jsoup || for hCard parsing || HTML-parsing library used for parsing hCards. ||
|| [http://freemarker.org FreeMarker] || org.freemarker || freemarker || for hCard writing || Templating library used for creating HTML pages that contain hCards. ||

Maven-enabled projects can exclude dependencies like so:

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode.ez-vcard</groupId>
  <artifactId>ez-vcard</artifactId>
  <version>...</version>
  <exclusions>
    <!-- hCard functionality not needed -->
    <exclusion>
      <groupId>org.jsoup</groupId>
      <artifactId>jsoup</artifactId>
    </exclusion>
    <exclusion>
      <groupId>org.freemarker</groupId>
      <artifactId>freemarker</artifactId>
    </exclusion>
  </exclusions>
</dependency>
}}}
